# Erc20Mintable.getMintTransaction() method

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
>
> Use `contract.erc20.mint.prepare(...args)` instead

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMintTransaction(to: AddressOrEns, amount: Amount): Promise<Transaction>;
```

| Parameter | Type                                  | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| to        | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md) |             |
| amount    | [Amount](./sdk.amount.md)             |             |
